dcterms:creator: Y. Li
R. Yu
C. Shahabi
T. Liu
dcterms:description: PeMS-Bay is a highway speed dataset for traffic forecasting collected by California Transportation Agencies (CalTrans) Performance Measurement System (PeMS). The dataset includes 6 months of data aggregated in the frequency of 5 minutes. Spatially, it consists of 325 loop detectors in the Bay area.
dcterms:title: PeMS-Bay

dcterms:creator: Y. Li
R. Yu
C. Shahabi
T. Liu
dcterms:description: METR-LA is a highway traffic flow dataset containing data collected from 207 loop detectors in Los Angeles County. The dataset contains 3 months of data aggregated in the frequency of 5 minutes.
dcterms:title: METR-LA

dcterms:creator: Y. Shin
Y. Yoon
dcterms:description: Urban-core is an urban speed dataset containing data collected from DTG (Digital Tacho Graph) on Seoul Taxis. The dataset includes speed data aggregated at road segment level in 5-minute resolution for the duration of 1 month.
dcterms:title: Urban-core

dcterms:creator: Z. Cui
K. Henrickson
R. Ke
Y. Wang
dcterms:description: Seattle-Loop is a highway speed dataset collected from 323 loop detectors in the Greater Seattle Area. The dataset contains 5-minute resolution data for the entirety of 2015.
dcterms:title: Seattle-Loop
